      • createAndAddPatient

        public boolean createAndAddPatient​()
        Creates a new patient by getting input from user and put new patient to the patient arraylist.
        Returns:
        boolean True if created and added without any problem.

      • addPatient

        public void addPatient​(Patient newPatient)
        Adds new patient instance to the patient arraylist.
        Parameters:
        newPatient - Patient instance to be added.

      • removePatient

        public boolean removePatient​(int removedPatientSsn)
        Removes patient according to its SSN.
        Parameters:
        removedPatientSsn - Removed patient's SSN
        Returns:
        boolean True if removing is successfull.

      • removePatient

        public boolean removePatient​(Patient removedPatient)
        Removes patient from patient arraylist.
        Parameters:
        removedPatient - Removed patient instance.
        Returns:
        boolean True if removing is successfull.

      • getPatient

        public Patient getPatient​(int desiredPatientSsn)
        Returns patient instance according to given SSN.
        Parameters:
        desiredPatientSsn - Patient's SSN.
        Returns:
        Patient Corresponding patient instance. If not exists, return null.
